name: Grid Runner
description:
Grid Runner is an action-arcade game developed by Radical Entertainment. It was originally released in 1996. It was published by Virgin Interactive Entertainment. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Grid Runner on PlayStation, SEGA Saturn and PC.
It was produced by Brian Thalken and Stacy Allyn Hendrickson. It was scored by Paul Ruskay.
